name: SittingRingside
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Welcome to FightBook MMA Presents: Sitting Ringside. We’re not your cookie cutter show but what we do bring is news and topics from all aspects of the fighting game. The show is hosted by CEO of FightBook MMA Roberto Villa, Arlow Jumper, and David Rodriguez. This couldn’t be possible without the man behind the scenes President of FightBook MMA and Producer of FightBook MMA Productions Rudy Lara. So grab a drink, sit back, relax and hang out with us every Thursday at 7 p.m. MT. Below you can find our playlist of our show.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
